headline: 3 Reasons IEX is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, IDEX’s shares (currently trading at $184.50) have posted a disappointing 13.2% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
